/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and illuminating the street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
